RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutorado em Medicina Translacional (EPM - UNIFESP), Mestrado em Economia da Sade e Farmacoeconomia (UPF - Universitat Pompeu Fabra - Barcelona), MBA em Gesto Empresarial (FESP SP - Escola de Sociologia e Poltica de So Paulo). Graduado em Fisioterapia (UNIMEP) e Comunicao Social com nfase em Marketing (ESPM). Especializaes em Dermatofuncional e Cosmetologia (inspirar), Estatstica Aplicada (Unyleya), Pesquisa Clnica e Medical Affairs (FCM Santa Casa SP). Consultor e Professor em Ps-Graduao (INSPER - Instituto de Ensino e Pesquisa / ESPM - Escola Superior de Propaganda e Marketing). Ao longo de 35 anos de carreira no segmento da sade humana, j realizou mais de 2.500 estudos envolvendo medicamentos de praticamente todas as classes teraputicas existentes, alm de dispositivos mdicos e equipamentos hospitalares. Atua principalmente nos temas: Pesquisa, Analytics, Estatstica e Economia da Sade.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD in Translational Medicine (EPM - UNIFESP), Master's in Health Economics and Pharmacoeconomics (UPF - Universitat Pompeu Fabra - Barcelona), MBA in Business Management (FESPSP - Escola de Sociologia e Poltica de So Paulo). Graduated in Physiotherapy (UNIMEP) and Social Communication with an emphasis on Marketing (ESPM). Specializations in Dermatofunctional and Cosmetology (Inspirar), Applied Statistics (Unyleya), Clinical Research and Medical Affairs (FCM Santa Casa SP). He is a Postgraduate Consultant and Professor (INSPER - Institute of Education and Research / ESPM - Escola Superior de Propaganda e Marketing). Over his 35-year career in the human health segment, he has carried out more than 2,500 studies involving medicines from practically all existing therapeutic classes, as well as medical devices and hospital equipment. He works mainly on the following topics: Research, Analytics, Statistics and Health Economics.
